mapper.sql: id, nickName, name, identityNumber, email, sex, headImageUrl, userStatus, age, userTypeId, address, location, ip, level, createTime
mapper.select: SELECT u.id id, u.name name, u.headImageUrl headImageUrl from tb_user_info u left join tb_login l on u.id = l.userId where l.wechatId = #{wechatid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user_info (id, nickName, name, identityNumber, email, sex, headImageUrl, userStatus, age, userTypeId, address, location, ip, level, createTime ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identitynumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{headimageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usertypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now() )

mapper.update:
update tb_user_info
nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identityNumber = #{identitynumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT},
headImageUrl = #{headimageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userStatus = #{userstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userTypeId = #{usertypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_user_info set nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identityNumber = #{identitynumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, headImageUrl = #{headimageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userStatus = #{userstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userTypeId = #{usertypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
